name: APTTTests
title: aPTT Tests
description:
This value set is under development.

LOINC
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for Activated Partial Thromboplastin Clotting Time (aPTT) laboratory tests.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Laboratory Test or Observation),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent aPTT laboratory tests),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes aPTT laboratory tests that are part of a coagulation panel.)
